titles.title: Come To The Son Of Righteousness

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Come to the Son of Righteousness, He has healing in His wings. (2x)
He has healing in His wings. (2x)

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
He has healing in His wings. (2x)
Come to the Son of righteousness,
He has healing in His wings.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Come to the Bread, the Bread of Life,
And the hungry shall be filled. (2x)

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
And the hungry shall be filled. (2x)
Come to the Bread, the Bread of Life
And the hungry shall be filled.
